body.name: Auto Face Tracking Tripod - 360° Rotation Auto Tracking Phone Holder, No App, Phone Camera Mount with Remote and Gesture Control, Rechargeable Smart Shooting Holder for TIK Tok, Vlog, YouTube Video

features: 【Responsive and Smooth】BTEDZSW automatic face tracking tripod adopts the 2023 new version of AI chip, which increases the sensitivity by 3 times. It solves all jitter and tracking issues during shooting, allowing for better tracking of subjects and ensuring a smoother shooting experience.

【No App Required】This auto face tracking tripod is a smart tripod that intelligently tracks you without the need to download an app or connect Bluetooth. It's highly versatile and can fit different sizes of mobile phones, from 1.5 to 4 inches wide, making it suitable for all types of smartphones on the market. Plus, it's extremely portable, making it easy to take on-the-go for all your shooting requirements.

[Intelligent Gesture Control] The Auto Face Tracking phone holder adopts an excellent gesture recognition algorithm. Open the palm gesture to pause tracking in 3-5 seconds, and raise the OK gesture in 2-3 seconds to resume tracking.Double-clicking the power button will initiate automatic 360-degree rotation for hands-free shooting.

【Face Tracking AND Intelligent Shooting】This face tracking phone holder adopts AI computing system that can automatically recognize and track your face or body, 360° rotate steadily with your movement. Free your hands for video calls and live streaming.

【Standard 1/4 Inch Tripod Connector】: The tripod base can be easily detached and replaced with a standard 1/4 screw interface, making it compatible with other tripods. This means you can use this smart face tracking mount with other tripods for height adjustments or different shooting angles, providing more flexibility and convenience for your video recording needs.

【Built-in Rechargeable Battery】The smart tracking phone holder is equipped with a built-in rechargeable 1800mAh battery and USB charging port. After fully charged, it will last up to 6-8 hrs. The red charging indicator is on when charging, after the charging is completed, the red charging indicator goes out.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No APP and BLUETOOTH require. The Latest Multi-function Auto Face Tracking Tripod with Remote Have you ever envisioned having a personal cameraman who accompanies you, effortlessly obeys your commands with a simple gesture, captures your priceless moments in the most exquisite manner, and doesn't run out of energy too quickly? BTEDZSW could be the automatic tracking tripod you've been searching for
Face Auto Tracking Phone Holder Tripod 360° Rotation Intelligent Selfie Stick Phone Stand for iPhone & All Smartphone

Standard 1/4" Interfacer It comes with a standard 1/4 inch interface, which can be mounted on a tripod and adjust the angle and height, you have the option to attach a phone holder, camera mount, or most lightweight cameras. 360° FACE TRACKING TECHNOLOGY Never worry about missing any angles as you move around. It can rotate steadily 360 degrees to follow your movements, so you'll always be in the frame no matter where you go. Suita ble For Most Phone The included phone holder is designed to securely fit most i0s/Android phones, ranging in width from 75mm-100mm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive device for the cost
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this because my daughter is always on video calls with her friends and setting her phone down. I thought this would be a fun little tool for her to allow them to track her while she's constantly moving around. I didn't think how nifty this little device could be just for funIt does come with a little photo-taking remote which I didn't exactly use but would come in handy for capturing pictures from afar (Bluetooth linked)The base pad had rubber feet, unlike many other tripods I've used that slide around in some places. At least this will hold in place pretty well.Pros:- Can hold devices as small as GoPro and as big as my S23 Ultra with a big case- Adjustable to be portrait or landscape, also can flip over if you were capturing a video of someone else and wanted to watch as they were moving around without getting in the way- The base unscrews and allows you to put it on a camera tripod (I didn't have one to reference)- Has visual hand controls (can hold a hand out and will stop tracking, or OK sign to start tracking again)- For the price, this does more than some high-dollar items- Best for areas without little background movements- Rechargeable with provided USB-C cable (need power block or plug)- Compact enough to fit in most handbags or otherwise- No syncing or Setup required (minus remote)Cons:- Is glitchy at times for movement- Standing too close can throw off tracking- Tends to track any movement causing it to move (don't toss your arms/hands around)Overall: This isn't one of those few hundred-dollar trackers, but for the cost and capability, I am really impressed. Easy to move around and can be used for many things. Is it perfect? No, but for simple things like my daughter using it for calls, ya it may work great. It may even be useful for capturing video while out in the yard, where you are moving around a lot and want to catch it. It's a bit jumpy on movements and may not track very fast movements up close, but it did rather well, and wish I could put more than one video up at a time to show.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Surprisingly Well
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed at how well this tracking tripod works. This was my first attempt to use something like this for creating videos. I followed the included instructions and had no problem connecting my iPhone 15 to the little remote control trigger that comes with the tripod. Once that was done, I was immediately able to start creating iPhone videos with the tripod properly swiveling to follow me. Has been working great for me since I started using it.

reviews.reviewText: This was easy to set up. It really does follow your every movement. This would be great for a busy parent that wants to capture moment with their baby hands free. It’s also good for filming while moving, think dancing, cooking , exercising.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as described and nicely made
reviews.reviewText: this auto tracking tripod is pretty cool to have. mostly use it for my small business for when I go to the farmers market and go on Facebook or instagram live. the 360 feature is cool because people watching me online can get a glimpse of the event that im currently at. its very easy to use and set up. I don't use the auto tracking feature very often at all but ive tried it a few times at home and it seems to work just find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smart & Smooth: Auto-Tracking Tripod
reviews.reviewText: As someone who regularly produces content for platforms like TikTok, YouTube, and Vlogs, this smart shooting holder has significantly upped my video production game. This definitely isnt the products Ive used the are worth hundreds but does the job well enough.The 360° rotation capability of this tripod is its standout feature. It tracks movement, keeping the subject (in this case, me) centered in the frame without any manual adjustment. This feature alone has saved me countless hours that I would have otherwise spent adjusting the camera position.What impressed me further was the no-app requirement. This tripod operates independently, freeing me from the hassle of downloading and navigating through another app. The gesture control and remote are intuitive and responsive, making it incredibly user-friendly, even for those who aren't tech-savvy.The rechargeable aspect of this tripod adds to its convenience. I've used it for extended periods without worrying about battery life, which is a significant plus for outdoor shoots or longer recording sessions.However, it's worth noting that while the auto-tracking is generally smooth, there can be occasional hiccups in extremely fast-paced movements. It's not a dealbreaker, but something to be mindful of if your content involves high-speed action.
